To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: The recording is of a variety of clips featuring Minnie Pearl's comedy routines. The various stand up recordings feature Red Foley (musician), Rod Brasfield (comedian), George Morgan (musician), and Helen Traubel (opera singer). The recordings are labeled disc number fifteen, sixteen and seventeen. The recordings are believed to take place at the Grand Ole Opry. The recordings are from a number of unidentified dates.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
